Plot: An Bronntanas is a contemporary Irish crime thriller set against the backdrop of the Connemara Coastline on the West of Ireland and the dramatic lives of a local lifeboat crew. The story is told through both Irish and English.
Title: The Gift
Writer: Tom Collins, Eoin McNamee, Joe O'Byrne, Paul Walker
Actors: Michelle Beamish, Charlotte Bradley, Ciarán Charles, Dara Devaney
